column4: A sword made for giants. You can tell an expert craftsman made it--it still glimmers in the dim light (10dmg)
Even sitting you can tell his monstrous form towers over you (20hp)
column9: I wonder what this is the key to?

column4: Looks old but can still pack a punch (6dmg)
The bottle glows a comforting green (+5hp)
He’s clearly not thrilled you’ve entered his home. (7hp)
column9: Looks like the Goblin fastened it himself (3dmg)
